moves.1. e4: I wanted to try new openings today like the ponziani or the Alapins opening(1.e4 e5 2.Ne2). I just wanted to have some fun
moves.1... d5: The dreaded Scandinavian Defense. Bobby Fischer destroyer this opening before.
moves.2. exd5: Nc3 was interesting and transposes to the Dunst Opening. Nf3 was possible to and was a reversed Budapest
moves.2... Qxd5 3. Nc3 Qd8: John Bartholomew made a video on this variation.
moves.4. Bc4: I want to develop all my pieces on the kingside. D4 was an alternative played more that Bc4
moves.4... e5 5. Nf3 Bg4: What?! Loses to a tactic after...
moves.6... Kxf7 7. Nxe5+ Ke8 8. Qxg4: I took with the Queen because I wanted to check my opponent and take on g6 with my knight

gameName: A wacky miniature played by me
